verses.verse: For Your servant David’s sake, Do not turn away the face of Your Anointed.
(Job 29:14) The LORD has sworn in truth to David; He will not turn from it: “I will set upon your throne ((Ps. 89:3, 4, 33; 110:4)) the fruit of your body.
If your sons will keep My covenant And My testimony which I shall teach them, Their sons also shall sit upon your throne forevermore.”
